job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Remote
job.description: pJob DescriptionppstronguJob SummaryustrongppstrongInSight is a cuttingedge AI enablement platform that applies industry leading ML tools including custom models to classify and extract entities from unstructured content Document Images Audio and Video files other data files and sourcesstrongppbrppstrongThe ML Engineer is responsible for the developmentdeployment of Machine Learning models and other data processing algorithms for new and existing customer implementations into InsightnbspstrongppbrppstrongThe ML engineer works closely with multiple internal Iron Mountain teams to develop tech driven implementation solutions createenhance tools for performance improvementstrongppbrppstronguEssential Job ResponsibilitiesustrongpulliDevelop and deploy machine learning solution to perform classification and entity extraction of various forms of digital content Images Audiovideo and other digital file formatsliliWork with project managers solution architects and other ML engineers to deliver ML solutions into Iron Mountain Insight PlatformliliPerform feasibility analysis and deliver PoCs for various customer requirements associated to the processing of digital contentliliApplying effective visualization tools to make descriptive analysis and results intuitive and informative to the team and customersliulpbrppstronguFunctional Knowledge Skills amp CompetenciesustrongppstrongEducationstrongnbspnbspnbspnbsp Bachelor or Masters degree in Computer Engineering Computer Science Master degree preferredppbrppstrongSkillsnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp strongpulli3 years of professional experience in Python programmingliliMinimum of 2 years of experience on Machine Learning and AI techniquesliliExperience of cloud technologies and solutions  GCP PreferredliliSome experience with docker container and microservice deploymentliliAbility to multitask and prioritize issues in a complex environmentliulpp
